introduction.content: Hợp Phát Logistics Co., Ltd., founded in 2016, specializes in providing comprehensive logistics solutions, including international transportation, customs clearance, warehousing, and goods distribution. With the motto "Efficiency - Safety - Reliability", we are committed to delivering professional services, cost optimization, and meeting all customer transportation needs. With an experienced team and an extensive partner network, we take pride in being a reliable bridge that helps businesses expand their markets and enhance their competitiveness. Hợp Phát Logistics continuously improves its services and applies modern technology to ensure a safe, transparent, and convenient transportation process for our customers. Hợp Phát Logistics – Your trusted logistics solution!

ourServices.label: Our Services
ourServices.subLabel: We provide four types of transportation services to customers, along with related support services for the transportation process.

support.label: Support Services
support.content: Support services related to the transportation process.

address.label: Address
address.content: 585 Tung Thien Vuong, Ward 12, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City

subItems.address: 585 Tung Thien Vuong, Ward 12, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City

introduction.content: Hop Phat Logistics (founded in 2016) provides comprehensive logistics solutions, including international transportation, customs clearance, and warehousing. We are committed to fast, accurate, and efficient services to help businesses expand and optimize their supply chains.

routes.label: Strong presence in Southeast Asia and China routes
routes.desc: We provide full-container load (FCL) and less-than-container load (LCL) shipping at competitive prices with door-to-door delivery services. Additionally, HPL handles shipments under various terms such as EXW, FOB, CIF, etc.

handling.label: Handling all customer requests and orders
handling.desc: With years of experience in domestic freight transportation, HPL can confidently meet all customer needs.

experience.label: Experienced legal team
experience.desc: Our legal team, trained at top law universities in Vietnam, is ready to handle the most complex import-export documents for our customers.

saveTime.label: Maximize time savings for customers
saveTime.desc: If customers lack time or experience, HPL's Entrusted Service will complete their orders with just a single authorization document.

ourCommitment.label: OUR COMMITMENT
ourCommitment.desc: We are committed to providing excellent and unparalleled service to ensure the satisfaction of all customers. No matter where your quote is located or your cargo, our global reach, local flexibility, and strategic networks empower us to deliver innovative and cost-effective logistic solutions.

contact.label: Have you question or need any help for work consultant?

air.title: Air Freight
air.desc: Our Air Freight Services provide a fast, reliable, and secure shipping solution for urgent and high-value shipments. With an extensive global network and partnerships with leading airlines, we ensure your cargo reaches its destination quickly and safely.

fastReliable.label: Fast & Reliable
fastReliable.desc: Quick transit times for urgent shipments.

globalNetwork.label: Global Network
globalNetwork.desc: Strong airline partnerships ensuring worldwide coverage.

secureHandling.label: Secure Handling
secureHandling.desc: Ideal for high-value and fragile goods.

flexibleOptions.label: Flexible Shipping Options
flexibleOptions.desc: Choose express, standard, or economy services based on urgency and budget.

sea.title: Sea Freight
sea.desc: Our Sea Freight Services offer a cost-effective and reliable solution for transporting large shipments across international waters. Whether you need Full Container Load (FCL) or Less than Container Load (LCL), we provide tailored solutions to meet your shipping needs.

globalNetwork.label: Global Network
globalNetwork.desc: We partner with major carriers to ensure seamless shipping to ports worldwide.

shippingOptions.label: Flexible Shipping Options
shippingOptions.desc: Choose between FCL for exclusive container use or LCL for shared space to optimize cost.

transitTime.label: Reliable Transit Times
transitTime.desc: Scheduled sailings and efficient routing for on-time delivery.

price.label: Competitive Pricing
price.desc: Cost-effective solutions for your sea freight needs.

oorToDoor.label: Door-to-Door Solutions
oorToDoor.desc: From port to final destination, we manage the entire logistics process.

land.title: Land Transportation
land.desc: Our Land Transportation Services offer a cost-effective, flexible, and reliable solution for domestic and cross-border shipments. Whether you need trucking for small parcels or full truckloads, we ensure safe and timely delivery to your destination.

deliveryOptions.label: Flexible Delivery Options
deliveryOptions.desc: FTL for large shipments, LTL for cost-effective transport.

specialHandling.label: Specialized Transport
specialHandling.desc: Refrigerated trucking and oversized cargo transport available.

tracking.label: Real-Time Tracking
tracking.desc: Monitor your shipment’s journey at every stage.

support.title: Support Services
support.desc: Our Support Services ensure a seamless logistics experience by providing expert assistance in customs clearance, warehousing, packaging, and documentation. With our dedicated team, we help streamline your supply chain and minimize delays.

endToEnd.label: End-to-End Assistance
endToEnd.desc: Comprehensive logistics support for all transportation modes.

insurance.label: Freight Insurance
insurance.desc: Protect your cargo against damage or loss.

customerSupport.label: 24/7 Customer Support
customerSupport.desc: Dedicated assistance for all your logistics needs.

lookup.title: Look up bill of lading
lookup.description: Look up information related to your order using the form below.
lookup.input_label: Container Number / Bill of Lading Code
lookup.input_placeholder: Enter Container Number / Bill of Lading Code
